thread.section_title: The 2 Week Diet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The 2 Week Diet | www.2weekdiet.com
thread.title: Sarah Cook
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by Sarah Cook

author: Sarah Cook
title: Sarah Cook
text: I LOVE the 2 week diet! It's the first diet that I've tried that has given me so many results in such little time. I've already lost 5 pounds in one week plus I've learned so much about my body and why it stores or releases fat. Brian tells you how to eat, what supplements you should be taking and what type of exercises you should be doing to get and stay fit. I've already gotten two of my girlfriends started on this diet and I know they will have amazing results as well.
